===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こまぶえ}}

# a [[komabue]]: a [[transverse]] flute used in traditional Japanese court music
#: Traditionally made of bamboo, about 36 cm in length. Has six finger holes of roughly 1 cm in diameter. Originally brought to Japan by the [[w:Baekje|Baekje]] elite circa 660 CE when the Baekje kingdom in the south of the Korean Peninsula fell to the combined forces of the [[w:Silla|Silla kingdom]] and the [[w:Tang dynasty|Tang Dynasty]].
